name: Zombie Reality
description:
You're trapped in a town full of zombies (capsules) collect guns and attempt to survive as long as possible in this VR game!

there are three different types of guns and one grenade:

Semi Auto: fires one shot when trigger pulled, has 10 bullets.

Full Auto: fires repeatedly while trigger held, has 50 bullets.

Shotgun: Fires one burst when trigger pulled, has 2 bullets.

Grenade: Press and release the trigger to arm then throw, explodes after three seconds.

As well as two types of zombie:

Normal: walks towards the player and attempts to damage them when near.

Fast: runs toward the player and attacks when near.

this project was developed for the Oculus Quest with Oculus link however I have ensured that the controls at least work for the HTC Vive.

Controls:

Left Joystick to move, right to turn (thumbpads for vive).

hold grip to hold items, release grip to drop them.

pull the trigger to shoot your gun.

hold A or X to reload the gun in that hand (menu button for vive).
